commentText: What was the point of fucking Chinese subtitles?

replies.commentText: Sweet Genius firt of all if you dont like chinese then idk what the hell are you here, and second, every single chinese tv drama, film, tv program has chinese sub, even if is live...

China has an incredibly high literacy rate, but people in rural areas, particularly older folks, may not speak or understand standard Mandarin fluently.

Since, with a few small exceptions, Mandarin and all the dialects share an identical writing system, differing only in pronunciation and a few grammar and slang usage points, subtitles are provided on national stations so that people who may not understand Mandarin well can still watch the programs.

In addition, it helps me a lot as a beginner to learn Chinese.
you fucking idiot，if you don't like it，get out
I think what he meant is he can't read the chinese subtitles and expected english subtitles..
Bruh it helps a lot for those learning Chinese as their second. Without the subtitles I would only understand half of it. It's pretty fast, but the words are relatively simple.
